SELECT * FROM( SELECT
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) -1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE ,
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) -1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE ,
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.VIEW_CNT DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE,
A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.PATTERN_NAME, A.VIEW_CNT, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPD_DATE, DECODE(A.STATUS , 'Y' , '사용함' , 'N' , '사용안함' , '대기') STATUS FROM PCN_PATTERN_GALLERY A
STATUS = #approval#
TITLE LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%'
PATTERN_NAME LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%'
USER_ID LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%'
REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_start$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#
